text: Gumazamizir damazir okavɨrɨziba ua gari, ezɨ gumazamizir suer amɨriziba uam arui. Ezɨ gumazamizir lepa itiba ua zuegha dera, ezɨ gumazamizir kuarir orazir puvatɨziba uam orasi. Ezɨ ovengezir gumazamiziba ua dɨkavima, ezɨ gumazamizir onganarazibagh amiba Akar Aghuim barasi.11:5 Godɨn akam inigha izezir gumazim Aisaia fomɨra ghaze, God uan adarazi Israelian akurvaghamim dughiam, arazir kaba otivam. Nɨ Aisaia 35:1-7 ko 61:1-4ɨn gan.
